::Steps out of the shadows at the scene of the battle at Yan's house::

"On behalf of my people...DIE CAPITALIST PIG!  LONG LIVE THE UNION OF SOVIET 
SOCIALIST REPUBLICS!"

::Pulls out an AK-47 and opens fire on the Americans::

::Sees that Yan ran and Unicron is approaching::

"Errr...did I say die capitalist pig?  I meant, long live the capitalist 
pigs...and Long live the USSR?  I meant don't live long USSR...errr...bye!"  
::Runs like hell::

::Spots Kinger::

"You know...I think stuff from Monty Python and the Holy Grail are copyr--" 
::Turns to see Unicron's foot come and down, is crushed into the ground::

::Gets up, runs over to Yan::

"GOOD!  You have a satelli--OH NO!  The author Robert Doherty!  QUICKLY!  WE 
MUST LEAVE RUSSIA!  Before he nukes us again in one of his damn books!"  
::Gets on moped and slowly, slowly begins to drive away::
